text: Hello I think the redirects you can see in the redirection part of HubSpot in the settings to make your 301 redirect.<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/domains-and-urls/create-and-manage-url-redirects>

Also for pages that no longer exist I recommend you to see in google SEO Console and remove the page in question. Wait at least half a day and you will see the pages disappear.<https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9689846?hl=en>
Hello, despite the fact that I add the meta description in HubSpot. I always receive a message telling me that the page has no meta description I do not understand
There is no meta description pulling through per SEO Scout, but it does show in your code - I'm not sure what would make the HS SEO tool and SEO Scout miss it, certainly strange.
Thank you <@U03AKL6Q1B2>. I myself do not understand. I think I will add it directly in the code to solve the problem
I forgot to add that <meta name="description" content="{{ page_meta.meta_description }}"> in addition to the tag {{ standard_header_includes }}
Ah, glad you figured it out
